reviews.review: GLaDOS sos una puta de mierda

Что в космосе тебе нравится больше всего? Мне — космос.
Космос. Космос не может ждать.
Космос. Суд. Система в суде. Виновен. Что был в космосе. Иду в космическую тюрьму.
Папа! Я в космосе! Я горжусь тобой, сынок. Папа, ты космос? Да. Мы снова вместе.
Космос. Космос. Хочу в космос. Да, пожалуйста. Космос. Космос, космос. Лечу в космос.
Космос, космос. Хочу в космос.
Космос, космос. Лечу в космос. О да.
Лечу в космос. Уже лечу. Не могу ждать, надо лететь. Космос. Лечу.
Космос. Космос.
Я иду в космос.
Космос. Космос. Надо в космос.
Космос. Космос. Лечу в космос.
Космос.
Космос.
О-о-о, космос.
Хочу в космос. Космос.
Полетели в космос. Полетели в космос.
Я люблю космос. Люблю космос.
Атмосфера. Черные дыры. Космонавты. Туманности. Юпитер. Большая Медведица.
КОСМОООС

Sogar im Jahr 2021 hat dieses Spiel noch eine sehr sehr gute Grafik und das ist für ein 10 Jahre altes Spiel sehr beachtlich. Ich würde Portal 2 wirklich jedem ans Herz legen es ist ein wirklich schönes und gutes Spiel
игра даже хорошо играется в 2021 году
自己过关时很有成就感
这个游戏他解密味不是一点点重，我和我朋友玩，想到咋通关就在那嗷嗷叫还駡大傻逼
There is a part where he kills you
pretty good tho some of the puzzles dont make sense
One of the best puzzle games I have ever played. Enjoyable, funny, interesting and challenging. Highly recommended.
Basically the best game ever made. And it's like 8 bucks. Basically a steal.
her şeyiyle dört dörtlük oyun. sonu ayrı başı ayrı ortası ayrı güzel almayan bin pişman

I played this when it came out a decade ago on the ps3 and it blew my mind away. I recently played it again and loved it the way i did the first time. 10 out of 10 game. My number 1 favourite game of all time. A Masterpiece.
One of the best games ever made
Игра, сюжет которой может показаться весьма простым, но такой стиль подачи и переданные эмоции заставляют задуматься. Один из лучших бестселлеров от Valve по моему мнению
portal 2 and 1 is so cool but i got no portal 1
Лучшая игра десятилетия! Игра моего детство всем рекомендую!
идея крутая, сюжет тоже. Единственный минус - легкие головоломки и то не всегда

Yes, I recommended this game. And i already read final hours. Thank Valve team build this wonder game.

No more count to three, i accept that. I want tell something.On old time like 90s, classic game sometime they stuck on develop, they will release advanced version of their game. Like magaman or metal slug, they make it 'X' version, [i][X mean advanced][/i]. After that, they continue next number of their game, mostly next number is finalize, advanced, and fun to play.

So I hope valve can develop portal 2 with [u]advanced chamber[/u], with same story line and same graphical. Also can add a few new element to build.
Valve team, You all give the price, many fan and player will pay it.

3D game is hard to imagination, need keep testing and thinking. Keep healthy life and happy to working. And portal 2 say, "Remember, testing is the future, and the future start with you".

Gra jest naprawdę super! Jest to coś w rodzaju ulepszonej "jedynki" z nowymi mechanikami oraz dłuższą, bardziej rozwiniętą fabułą pełną ciekawych zagadek logicznych. Polecam każdemu kto zagrał w pierwszą część Portala oraz osobom lubiącym klimacik przeplatany z zadaniami wymagającymi główkowania.
绝佳的单人剧情，更棒的双人谜题

Игра очень интересная, крутой сюжет, забавные персонажи, НО долго сидеть тут не получиться, да есть пользовательские карты, но они чё то не оч, советую просто купить Portal Boundle и пройти две части.

I loved playing this game. It's puzzles are challenging yet enjoyable, and it's story makes you want to know more about it's world. I would rate it a 9/10. The only downside is that I want to play more even after the game is over.

通关了，GLaDOS唱歌真好听~~
话痨也可爱，虽然我猜到他要叛变了

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here; "Huge success"
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake
You just keep on trying
Till you run out of cake
And the science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you
Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned-
For the people who are
Still alive
Go ahead and leave me
I think I'd prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you?
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke *Haha - Fat Chance*
Anyway this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist
Look at me: still talking
When there's science to do
When I look out there,
It makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are
Still alive
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive
Still alive
игра топ обожаю говоломки и игры по сети советую всем
关卡设计，场景设计教科书
just as good as the first game. would not recommend if you had to look up tutorials for levels before, it doesn't get easier from here on out

Jugué el multijugador con un amigo y terminamos muertos al mismo tiempo al intentar pasar por una puerta con temporizador mientras un robot nos insultaba.
20/10 podemos chocar los cinco.
G L A D O S is the best written villain in any form of media. 10/10

Jesus christ, this was so much better than i thought i would be. Let me make a confession... i'am not really smart at logical puzzly games, but this game was over the top with its quality. I never had to search for a hint online nor i ever got stuck. It's a must have for everyone at this point.
Phenomenal puzzle game, excellent story and humor.  One of my favorite games ever.
mas completo y divertido que el primero compralo si el uno te gusto
tanto jugar a esto me hace querer traspasar las paredes la puta madre muy buen juego un final esquisito y la concha de la abuela de VALVE
A sequel that is very good.

This game is very good, the gameplay is fluid, there are more levels, and there is a lot of community-created content. The story is amazing, like Kindom Hearts (I say that because I heard that Kindom Hearts is good; I haven't played the game at all). I'd say it's one of the most well-written story games I've played of all time. Also, the multiplayer has a separate campaign! Also, no, this review was not me playing for the first time. I played this game for 100+ hours, and I'm still making community maps today.

(Edit: not 100+ hours, it's about 93 hours...)
Gracias Valve por no darnos una tercera parte
Wish there was a portal to my bong.

🔲 Fácil de entender

If you liked Portal, you'll love Portal 2. If you like fun puzzles and physics, you'll love Portal 2. If you like a great story with hilarious writing, you'll love Portal 2. If you like funny robots, you'll love Portal 2. If you like Science, you'll love Portal 2. If you like potatoes, you'll love Portal 2. If you like the colors blue and orange, you'll love Portal 2.

You WILL love Portal 2. And if you don't, J.K Simmons will burn your house down with a combustible lemon. So you better put on your jumpsuit and Long Fall Boots, grab your Portal Gun and a British Eyeball, and Do Some Science.
